body.name: VASAGLE Bookcase, Tree-Shaped Bookshelf with 8 Storage Shelves, Rounded Corners, 19.7 x 9.8 x 55.1 Inches, Rustic Brown ULBC66BXV1
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 35 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 35 mins
features: An Invitation to Nature: Like a beautiful, majestic tree with silky smooth brown bark, this large bookcase spreads its branches in your living room to sublimate your reading space. Let the peaceful calm of the forest enter your home!

Orderly Space: Make this tree-shaped shelf bloom by placing all your treasures on its branches. It has 8 compartments to store your books...but that’s not all! Also put CDs, magazines, decorations, potted plants, and much more!

Safety Matters: With side panels and 2 back panels to keep books in place, rounded corners to prevent bumps, and an anti-tip kit to attach it to the wall, this bookcase offers a feeling of security, keeping both your books and you in good hands

Slides into Small Spaces: With its compact size of 19.7”L x 9.8”W x 55.1”H, this bookcase takes up very little space. You can easily create a reading corner in a living room, bedroom, or office that you thought was too small
No Lonely Waiting: Here, good things don’t need to wait; with step-by-step instructions and numbered parts included, you’ll set this bookshelf up and ready to hold your book collection!
body.description: A Peaceful Escape PlacePlace this tree-shaped shelf next to a bright window, sit comfortably close to its roots, open your favorite novel, and plunge into a faraway world accompanied by a ray of sunshine. This bookcase takes you to new destinations.It's All in the DetailsIn addition to its well-crafted finishes, no odor is released from this shelf thanks to the particleboard. Having this bookcase in your home is to express your taste for quality things!Specifications:- Color: Rustic Brown- Material: Particleboard- Product Size: 19.7”L x 9.8”W x 55.1”H (50 x 25 x 140 cm)- Product Weight: 25.1 lb (11.4 kg)- Max. Static Load Capacity per Compartment: 22 lb (10 kg)- Max. Static Load Capacity Total: 110 lb (50 kg)Package Contents:- 1 x Bookshelf- 1 x Anti-Tip Kit- 1 x Assembly Kit- 1 x InstructionsVASAGLE Notes:- Children are not allowed to climb on the product or play with it.- The max. static load capacity is 22 lb per shelf, please do not exceed this limit.- For safety reasons, please secure the product to the wall with the included anti-tip kit.- Please lift the product and not drag it when you want to move it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It takes a little time to assemble something so perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I really loved this, it's instructions were easy to follow, there were a lot of pieces but it just became muscle memory after a minute of doing it and it was so simple. The bookshelf itself is beautiful and very sturdy. It comes with a wall mount but Im not using it and it still feels so sturdy on the carpet. Perfect amount of space for my books and a few little decorations/plants. It was packaged safely and arrived fully intact. I nicked it with my knife when trying to get off the stickers but it didn't look so horrible and i was able to mostly buff it out, i probably should have been more careful anyways! I really am satisfied and its such a beautiful addition to my room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very modern bookcase and it is the perfect size for my small office space. I was afraid it would be difficult to assemble but I was able to complete assembly within 3 hours. Very sturdy. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this shelf to use primarily for my figures and such. And man does it look good! It was incredibly easy to assemble (having an electric ratchet helped). The finish on the wood is beautiful and it's not the cheap stuff you'd find on most other pieces. They even included stickers to cover the assembly piece letters to make it look more authentic. I'd definitely buy (and plan on doing so) this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Watch before buying, could be helpful
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Time consuming & confusing instructions at times but it’s a beautiful shelf & the result is worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice shelves for the price
reviews.reviewText: For the price they are really good shelves. We bought two for my in law, and assembly was simple following the instructions. Liked the fact there were mostly screws holding this together, and not a ton of cam locks. We managed to assemble both shelves in about 1.5 hours, and are pleased with the arrangement and sizes of the different shelves; for all the various nick nacks the mother in law has to put on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had no problems with the shelf. A well made unit. Everything went together perfectly. Would recommend this shelf. Very pleased and satisfied. A well made product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not THAT Hard To Assemble
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy this shelf because so many reviews said how bad the instructions were and how hard it was to put it together. If that's holding you back, go ahead and buy it because it's a cool looking piece that isn't THAT hard to assemble.It took me an hour or so to put it together, but I never got confused or frustrated. The worst part is that there's 40 alan screws that you have to put in with a tiny alan wrench -- so the assembly is tedious. Just grab a beer and throw something light onto the tv while you do it. My advice would be to pay attention to the instruction manual. There arent any words and you'll want to make sure your pieces match the orientation of the pieces in the manual or else the screw holes won't match up right.I really like the shelf and am considering buying a 2nd one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is very cute!! And made well. I want to buy another one but use it for my closet to organize clothes. 10/10 recommend that you buy it.
Se ve resistente, solo que el color es más obscuro que el de la imagen.Lo armé yo sola en unas 3 horas. Viene con instrucciones muy fáciles de seguir.
I bought two different things from this company. Both great. Shelf was easy to assemble. It has good quality and very special design. I am completely satisfied

reviews.reviewTitle: Really nice but not too sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The bookshelf is really nice, neat and pretty, easy to assemble. It is not too sturdy, though and I'm always afraid it may fall (there is a clip to attach it to the wall but we cannot use it in a rented flat).
REcomendable para espacios pequeños. de buena calidad. recomendable. Buena relacion entre precio y calidad.
Prodotto spettacolare molto rustico.Ne ho prese due :)Imballaggio perfetto.Attenzione alle istruzioni leggetele bene
